Michael Gove , the Education Secretary, said "profound mistakes" made with the curriculum by Labour led to England plummeting in international league tables. Writing in The Daily Telegraph today, he said: The top-performing education nations all have rigorous curricula which act as a benchmark for achievement and a guide to essential knowledge. "But while we have one of the biggest curricula in the world- at nearly 500 pages- it has failed a generation by not preparing them for the modern world. "The existing national curriculum embodies poverty of aspiration. A new primary and secondary school curriculum is expected to be in place by September 2013. I was there when she was surrounded by her friends in the Congress and Senate. And I think it was a combination, perhaps, of the unexpected and the familiar that really prompted her to open her eyes and look around, said her doctor, Dr. Michael Lemole. But it was Gabrielle Giffords ' husband's reaction to this milestone that made Kirsten Gillibrand realize this was the very first time Gabrielle Giffords had opened her eyes since being shot.

/ Bloomberg News Fiat SpA Chief Executive Officer Sergio Marchionne confirmed the Italian carmaker's pledge to spend 20 billion euros($ 27 billion) revamping its domestic plants after meeting with Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi . Fiat is a multinational which is expanding internationally, but will keep an Italian heart, Industry Minister Paolo Romani said today after discussing the investment plan with the CEO and Chairman John Elkann .
